title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS Mitsubishi Pajero NM NX 4M41 3.2L DID 2006-2015 – ProVent Oil Catch Can Vehicle Specific Kit OS-PROV-08

content.rendered:
ProVent 200 Oil Catch Can Kit suits:

Mitsubishi Pajero 3.2L D-ID NM NX 4M41 2006-2015

*** Note: This kit won’t fit if the vehicle is fitted with a TJM/Airtech snorkel, but does fit if a Safari snorkel is fitted ***

MANN+HUMMEL ProVent Catch Can’s separate oil from the air intake and saves costly repairs due to blocked EGR’S, Turbo’s & intercoolers.

This kits comes complete with everyting you require to fit to your vehicle including a stainless steel mounting bracket, Oil resistant hoses clamps the lot. Blocked Egr’s (Exhaust Gas Recirculation Valves) are a common and expensive problem for the Mitsubishi diesel engine, fitting this Oil catch can will save you a fortune and keep the engine performing like the first day you drove it !

Provent Kit Includes:

:: Provent Unit :: Stainless Steel Bracket :: Top & Bottom Hoses :: Fittings :: Drain Kit

Download Installation Instructions >

Advantages of MANN+HUMMEL ProVent Catch Cans as opposed to cheaper imports:

• Highly efficient oil separation providing ideal protection for the turbocharger and other components installed downstream

• Low pressure loss • Less motor oil consumption in comparison to less efficient separators or conventional open systems

• Maintenance friendly: fittings are not removed during element maintenance

• Universal usage: exceptional for variable flow rates • No electrical energy required • Low running costs

• Integrated safety feature against irregularly high crankcase pressure • Compact design • Light and robust design
